originalText.text: First meeting with Anne Veroneau, N.P.. Anne was attentive, thorough, competent and kind. I left my follow up evaluation feeling relieved and hopeful; relief of my symptoms are possible. Thank you.

text.text: First meeting with Anne Veroneau, N.P.. Anne was attentive, thorough, competent and kind. I left my follow up evaluation feeling relieved and hopeful; relief of my symptoms are possible. Thank you.

originalText.text: Although I requested an in-office visit with Anne Veroneau through email several times (which is what I would have prefer) I ended up having a video visit at Cornell Hospital in the patient waiting room when I was there at my schedule appointment time.  The visit went well and I will make another appointment to see Anne Veroneau again in three months.

text.text: Although I requested an in-office visit with Anne Veroneau through email several times (which is what I would have prefer) I ended up having a video visit at Cornell Hospital in the patient waiting room when I was there at my schedule appointment time.  The visit went well and I will make another appointment to see Anne Veroneau again in three months.

originalText.text: Ms. Veroneau is a terrific and most capable N.P. She was extremely helpful and gracious with her time during my recent appointment. I am thrilled to be a patient in her practice and highly recommend her without reservation.

text.text: Ms. Veroneau is a terrific and most capable N.P. She was extremely helpful and gracious with her time during my recent appointment. I am thrilled to be a patient in her practice and highly recommend her without reservation.

originalText.text: Ann was very thorough and asked about the efficacy of the medication being prescribed. Based on the answers I was able to move to a lower dose.  Appreciate the extra questions that she posed to improve my medication.

text.text: Ann was very thorough and asked about the efficacy of the medication being prescribed. Based on the answers I was able to move to a lower dose.  Appreciate the extra questions that she posed to improve my medication.

originalText.text: Anne Veroneau listened and understood why I was there. She is knowledgeable, professional and caring. It was a highly productive visit. I walked out feeling I was in the hands of a superb team.
